item.title: FO - Product Page - Add to cart
item.description: FO - Product Page - Add to cart Details Component : Core Status : IN REVIEW Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1256 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO> click onÂ an existing product image The page of the product is well displayed Click on quantity and set it to 5 The quantity value is updated On page of the product> Click on “Add to cart” The modal is well displayed.
